title: Political changes and Second Great Awakening

content.question: Which of the following political changes most likely influenced the Second Great Awakening?

choices.label: The president called for the removal of American Indians from the southeastern states.
Southern politicians threatened to nullify the authority of the federal government.
A participatory democracy expanded belief in the importance of the individual.
A series of judicial rulings supported the development of infrastructure projects.

content.answer: A participatory democracy expanded belief in the importance of the individual.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
